alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Dimmit; Frio; Medina; Uvalde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 10:15PM CDT until May 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Medina County in south central Texas... Northeastern Dimmit County in south central Texas... Southeastern Uvalde County in south central Texas... Zavala County in south central Texas... Frio County in south central Texas... Western Atascosa County in south central Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1014 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Washer to near Big Wells, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pearsall, Crystal City, Carrizo Springs, Dilley, Big Wells, La Pryor, Batesville, Sabinal, Asherton, North Pearsall, Moore, Goldfinch, Chula Vista-River Spur, D`Hanis, Hilltop, Las Colonias, Brundage, Carrizo Hill, Loma Vista and Las Vegas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Atascosa; Dimmit; Frio; Medina; Uvalde; Zavala
